hibernate-mapping.query: FROM BaCityMaster co WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT '1' FROM StRoutingNoDtls r, PmFinInstDirMast f, BaCityMaster c WHERE r.compositeId.codRoutingNo = f.compositeId.codFinInstId AND CONCAT('', r.codCity) = TRIM(SUBSTRING(c.cityName, INSTR(c.cityName, '-') + 1)) AND r.compositeId.flgMntStatus = 'A' AND r.compositeId.flgMntStatus = 'A' AND f.codBI = :codBI AND c.compositeId.cityCode = co.compositeId.cityCode AND CONCAT( CASE WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 1 THEN CONCAT('000', r.codCity) WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 2 THEN CONCAT('00', r.codCity) WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 3 THEN CONCAT('0', r.codCity) ELSE CONCAT('', r.codCity) END, CONCAT(' - ', co.cityName) ) LIKE UPPER(:strLike) )

SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 1 THEN CONCAT('000', r.codCity) WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 2 THEN CONCAT('00', r.codCity) WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 3 THEN CONCAT('0', r.codCity) ELSE CONCAT('', r.codCity) END AS id, CONCAT( CASE WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 1 THEN CONCAT('000', r.codCity) WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 2 THEN CONCAT('00', r.codCity) WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 3 THEN CONCAT('0', r.codCity) ELSE CONCAT('', r.codCity) END, CONCAT(' - ', TRIM(SUBSTRING(c.cityName, 1, INSTR(c.cityName, '-') - 1))) ) AS value FROM StRoutingNoDtls r, PmFinInstDirMast f, BaCityMaster c WHERE r.compositeId.codRoutingNo = f.compositeId.codFinInstId AND CONCAT('', r.codCity) = TRIM(SUBSTRING(c.cityName, INSTR(c.cityName, '-') + 1)) AND r.compositeId.flgMntStatus = 'A' AND r.compositeId.flgMntStatus = 'A' AND f.codBI = :codBI AND CONCAT( CASE WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 1 THEN CONCAT('000', r.codCity) WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 2 THEN CONCAT('00', r.codCity) WHEN LENGTH(r.codCity) = 3 THEN CONCAT('0', r.codCity) ELSE CONCAT('', r.codCity) END, CONCAT(' - ', c.cityName) ) LIKE UPPER(:strLike)
